::Prowl::

Prowl tightens his hold on Iron Raptor as he feels her start to wriggle in 
his grasp. Wriggling 100 feet up in the air was never good, but ... her body 
felt very good against his.

Prowl blinks. This was not something to think about in the battlefield. He 
looks up just in time to see Oblitertron's optic shot heading for him.

He takes in a sharp breath as the optic blast him in the wing, leaving a hole 
in it and sending him and Iron Raptor into a spiral, slowly losing altitude. 
He growls, straightening his damaged wing as far as he can to rebalance 
himself, slightly regaining the glide but still losing altitude.

"Hang on," he says to Iron Raptor through clenched theeth, "This is going to 
be a bumpy landing."
